column4: hi guys, after i update some packages, my sound is not working
and when i type alsamixer in terminal, it gives me no such file error
how to fix?  i am using ubuntu 8.04 dell version
anyone know how to install alsamixer back?
that package contains the alsamixer binary
do u know why my alsamixer is gone?
nope.. no idea. As far as I know it's installed by default
i have it last week, but i think i did some update days ago now sounds dont work
what happens if you run that command I told you?
